plugins.name: Create Red Rectangle Plugin
plugins.description:
Objective: Implement functionality where clicking a button creates a red rectangle on the workspace.


Implementation Plan:


Creating the Interface:


Add a button labeled "Create Rectangle."

Prepare a canvas or container where the rectangle will appear.

Styling Elements:


Define styles for the button (e.g., color, shape).

Set default dimensions and properties for the rectangle (e.g., width, height, background color).

Programming Logic:


Write an event handler for the button: on click, create an element with predefined properties (e.g., width, height, color).

Append this element to the container on the page.

Testing the Functionality:


Ensure the red rectangle appears correctly and only when the button is clicked.

Optionally, add features such as slightly offsetting the position of each new rectangle.
plugins.tagline: Rectangle

plugins.name: Section Generator
plugins.description:
Allows you to create a large number of sections all at once. This is a great way to organize a handoff file with each row for different functionality or features.


Main section

Each main section is a row with a cover tile. The cover tile will be titled with the name you give. Main sections are stacked vertically.


Subsections

Configure the number of subsections you want per row. Subsections are spaced horizontally.


-> Allows you to include any number of desktop (1440) and mobile (390) screens

-> Each screen has a notes field below it for your annotations
plugins.tagline: Create sections of sections for an organized design handoff

plugins.name: Move Outside
plugins.description:
A plugin designed to move any elements outside of their current frames and place them at the top of the hierarchy while retaining their original position relative to the entire page. The plugin offers two modes:


  1. Default - Moves selected single or multiple elements to the top of the page’s layer hierarchy.
  2. Locked Target - Moves selected single or multiple elements into another specified layer. The Locked Target mode supports moving into frames, frames with autolayout, and sections. If the Locked Target is an autolayout frame, users can choose whether the moved frames should retain their original page position using absolute positioning or adapt to the autolayout.


This plugin stands out from others with similar functionality by offering a full interface that enables continuous management of complex layer structures.
plugins.tagline: A plugin used to move elements to the top of the layer hierarchy or to other frames/sections.

plugins.name: ExportEase
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma design tokens into clean, organized code files that developers will love.

ExportEase bridges the gap between design and development by intelligently exporting your Figma variables and styles to 6 professional formats: CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, JSON, Dart, and Tailwind CSS.

🎯 Why ExportEase?

Smart Organization: Automatically creates separate files for each collection and mode (perfect for light/dark themes). No more messy, mixed token files.

Professional Output: Advanced sorting algorithm handles complex naming patterns - from simple numbering to semantic scales (xs, sm, md, lg, xl).

Developer-Ready: Generates production-quality code with proper formatting, comments, and import instructions. Variables are correctly formatted with fallbacks and references.

Effortless Workflow: One-click exports with ZIP downloads containing organized files and a helpful README with import instructions.

Multiple Formats for Every Stack:

CSS Custom Properties for modern web

SCSS Variables for preprocessing workflows

JavaScript ES6 modules with TypeScript support

JSON for any platform or documentation

Dart constants for Flutter development

Tailwind CSS config extensions ready to use

Perfect for:

✨ Design systems teams maintaining consistent tokens

✨ Developers who need clean, organized design token files

✨ Projects with multiple themes or brands

✨ Teams working across web, mobile, and Flutter platforms

The Result: Instead of manually copying variables or getting messy exports, you get perfectly organized, developer-friendly files that respect your Figma structure and naming conventions.

Export once, use everywhere. Your design tokens, exactly how your developers want them.
plugins.tagline: Transform design tokens into developer-ready code

139997.release_notes:
# 🚀 ExportEase - Advanced Design Token Exporter

## Transform Your Figma Variables into Production-Ready Code

**ExportEase** is the most comprehensive design token export plugin for Figma, enabling seamless integration between design and development workflows. Export your Figma variables and styles to multiple code formats with just a few clicks.

---

## ✨ **What's New in This Update**

### 🎯 **Direct Download Feature**
- **Skip the preview, get your files instantly!** New direct download option bypasses the preview step
- Click "Download Selected Files" and get your tokens immediately as individual files or ZIP archives
- Perfect for CI/CD workflows and rapid prototyping

### 🔧 **Enhanced Export Experience**
- **Smart file organization** - automatically groups exports by collections and modes
- **Comprehensive error handling** with detailed debugging information
- **Improved state management** - no more stuck buttons or broken workflows
- **Better performance** with optimized token collection and analysis

---

## 🎨 **Core Features**

### **📦 Multiple Export Formats**
- **CSS Custom Properties** - Perfect for modern web applications
- **Tailwind Config** - Ready-to-use Tailwind CSS theme configuration
- **JavaScript/TypeScript** - Import tokens directly into your JS/TS projects

### **🎛️ Flexible Export Options**
- **Variables Export** - Convert Figma variables (colors, spacing, typography, etc.)
- **Styles Export** - Export paint styles, text styles, and effect styles
- **Selective Export** - Choose exactly which files and collections you need
- **Batch Export** - Export all collections and modes in one ZIP file

### **🏗️ Smart Organization**
- **Collection-based grouping** - Each variable collection becomes a separate file
- **Mode support** - Light/dark themes, responsive breakpoints, brand variations
- **Intelligent naming** - Converts Figma names to valid CSS/JS variable names
- **Conflict resolution** - Handles duplicate names and edge cases gracefully

---

## 🛠️ **Perfect For**

### **👩‍💻 Developers**
- Eliminate manual token copying and reduce errors
- Get production-ready code that integrates seamlessly
- Support for modern frameworks (React, Vue, Angular, etc.)
- Compatible with design system tools and component libraries

### **🎨 Designers**
- Maintain design-development consistency automatically
- Share design decisions as usable code
- Streamline handoff process with developers
- Support complex design systems with multiple themes

### **🏢 Teams**
- Establish single source of truth for design tokens
- Scale design systems across multiple products
- Reduce design-development friction and iteration time
- Enable design system governance and consistency

---

## 🚀 **How It Works**

1. **📊 Analyze** - Plugin automatically detects your variables and styles
2. **🎯 Select** - Choose your export format (CSS, Tailwind, or JS)
3. **📁 Pick Files** - Select which collections and modes to export
4. **⬇️ Download** - Get your files instantly or preview before download

---

## 💡 **Use Cases**

### **🌙 Theme Systems**
Export light/dark mode variables as separate CSS files or combined Tailwind config

### **📱 Responsive Design**
Convert breakpoint-specific spacing and typography scales to code

### **🎨 Brand Systems**
Export brand-specific color palettes and typography for multi-brand applications

### **🧩 Component Libraries**
Generate design tokens for React, Vue, or Angular component libraries

### **📖 Documentation**
Create token documentation and style guides automatically

---

## 🔧 **Technical Specifications**

- **🔗 Zero Dependencies** - Works entirely within Figma, no external services
- **📦 Multiple Output Formats** - CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS
- **🗂️ Smart File Organization** - Collection and mode-based structure
- **🛡️ Error Handling** - Comprehensive validation and user-friendly error messages
- **⚡ Performance Optimized** - Handles large design systems efficiently
- **🔄 Backward Compatible** - Works with existing Figma variable structures

---

## 🎯 **Keywords**
Design Tokens, CSS Variables, Tailwind CSS, Design System, Variables Export, Styles Export, Design-to-Code, Developer Tools, Design Handoff, Theme Export, Color Palette, Typography Scale, Spacing System

---

## 📞 **Support & Feedback**

Found a bug or have a feature request? We'd love to hear from you!
- **GitHub**: [Report Issues & Contribute](https://github.com/yourrepo/exportease)
- **Contact**: [sepantapouya.com](https://sepantapouya.com)

---

*Transform your design workflow today - consistent tokens, faster development, better products.* 🚀
139997.tagline: Transform design tokens into developer-ready code

plugins.name: FrameFlex - Frame Resizer & Scaler
plugins.description:
🔹 FrameFlex – Smart Frame Resizing for Figma 🎯

Manually resizing frames can be a nightmare — especially when things break.

FrameFlex is a Figma plugin built to help you intelligently scale mobile frames, while preserving structure and layout integrity (when properly set up). ✨


Here’s what FrameFlex can do:


🔁 Multi-frame support – Resize multiple mobile frames in one action.

📱 Device presets – Quickly apply popular mobile screen sizes like iPhone, Android, and more.

📐 Layout-aware resizing – Maintains Auto Layout, constraints, and alignment — if your design is structured correctly.

🔤 Element scaling – Adjusts font size, spacing, strokes, and other properties proportionally.

🎯 Icon/vector protection – Prevents scaling on specific elements to avoid distortion.

⚙️ Rounding controls – Use smart, grid, or exact rounding for clean results.


💡 The more Auto Layout you use, the better the results will be.

FrameFlex works best when your design is clean, consistent, and fully built with Auto Layout in mind.


✅ Focused on mobile-first workflows.

⚠️ Support for other frame types depends on how well they're structured.
plugins.tagline: Resize multiple frames. Preserve structure. Stay consistent.

plugins.name: Figma to Unity Exporter
plugins.description:
### Tired of manually recreating your Figma designs in Unity?


Figma To Unity Importer is the ultimate workflow solution designed to bridge the gap between designers and developers. Stop wasting hours meticulously rebuilding UI and start converting your high-fidelity Figma designs into fully functional, native Unity uGUI components with just a few clicks.


**[>> Demo Video <<](https://youtu.be/4XOTlUGIqJU?si=OCgCe0Sw7oBB6whx)**


**⚠️ IMPORTANT: This is one half of a powerful 2-part system.**

This Figma plugin exports your design data. To bring your designs to life in Unity, you need the professional importer asset from the Unity Asset Store.


---


### **➡️ Step 1: Get the Professional Unity Importer Asset**


To complete the workflow, please purchase and import the required companion asset from the Unity Asset Store. It's the engine that powers the entire import process in Unity, packed with advanced features to ensure a perfect conversion.


**[>> Get "UI/UX importer for Unity" on the Unity Asset Store ($15) <<](https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/ui-ux-importer-for-unity-323342)**


---


### **✨ Key Features:**


* **Accurate Conversion:** Preserves layer hierarchy, names, positions, sizes, and rotations.

* **Advanced Text Support:** Exports text as TextMeshPro components, maintaining font family, **font weight (including variable fonts)**, size, and color.

* **Image Export:** Automatically exports image fills and creates native Unity `Image` components.

* **Resolution Scaling:** Scale your entire UI to different screen sizes automatically.

* **Smart & Simple UI:** Remembers your last used settings and supports multiple languages.


### **🚀 Workflow:**


**1. In Unity (Setup):**

* Purchase and import the importer from the Asset Store using the link above.

* Install the required packages as described in the asset's documentation (TextMeshPro, UI, Newtonsoft.Json).


**2. In Figma (Export):**

* Run this plugin.

* Select the single, top-level Frame you want to export.

* Configure your options (target resolution, include images, etc.).

* Click "Export" to download the `.zip` file.


**3. In Unity (Import):**

* Unzip the downloaded file.

* Drag the `FigmaExport` folder into your Unity `Assets`.

* Open the importer via `Tools > KaiWorld UIUX Importer`.

* Assign the `hierarchy.json` file and click "Create UI".


That's it! Your design is now a native, ready-to-use UI in Unity.
plugins.tagline: The ultimate workflow bridge. Go from Figma design to a working Unity UI in minutes.

plugins.name: Remote Variable Replacer
plugins.description:
Sometimes Figma variables aren’t coming from inside the house. While this plugin has a likely very tiny amount of potential users, if I can help anybody save any time trying to locate and replace variables that are orphans or “remote”, then this has been worth it.


For whatever reason, variables in Figma can be attached to other libraries, older files, archived files even. This can cause major headaches when editing local variables and components don’t seem to respond to the edits.


I fully expect this plugin to have a limited lifespan as Figma themselves will likely improve variable handling during copy/pastes, schema renaming or other scenarios where variables can be orphaned.


In the meantime, I got you.
plugins.tagline: Replace those pesky remote variables!

I fully expect this plugin to have a limited lifespan as Figma themselves will likely improve variable handling during copy/pastes, schema renaming or other scenarios where variables can be orphaned.


In the meantime, I got you.
135284.release_notes:
Improved the dropdowns for numerical variables to only show local variables whose base value match the remote variable base value. This should make the plugin easy to navigate if a user has hundreds of variables.

Removed beta language; Included network access for tailwind for easy stying and unpkg.com for React. This should fix the blank screen of death. Rookie mistake!

Also updated the data security details to let users know the network access is only for static items.

plugins.name: Font Replacer
plugins.description:
Instantly view all fonts used in your selection, selectively replace specific font families, and preserve font weights and styles when switching to new fonts. Whether you're cleaning up inconsistent typography, updating your brand, or exploring new typefaces, Font Replacer makes the process fast, intuitive, and reliable.


  1. See all fonts in your selection at a glance
  2. Replace one or multiple font families with a single click
  3. Maintains font weights/styles (e.g., Bold, Italic) when switching families
  4. Handles mixed-font text layers and nested groups
  5. Smart fallbacks ensure your text always looks great
  6. Clean, modern UI with loading indicators for large selections

plugins.name: Font Detective
plugins.description:
Ever need to know exactly which fonts are in your project without clicking through dozens of text layers? Manually checking for fonts is slow and easy to miss one, especially in complex files.


Font Detective instantly scans your selection and provides a clean list of every font family it finds.


No more guesswork, no more hunting. ✨


How it works:


  1. Select a frame - Click on a single frame or select multiple frames
  2. Run "Font Detective" - One click and you're done
  3. Get results - Immediately see a complete list of all font families spotted within your selection.


Key Features:


  1. Quick Typography Audits - Get a fast and accurate inventory of the fonts in any file or component
  2. Maintain Consistency - Easily spot unwanted fonts that don't belong in your design system
  3. Streamline Cleanup - Use the generated list as a checklist to consolidate your font styles
  4. Effortless Handoff - Quickly provide a list of all used fonts to developers or teammates
  5. Simple & Fast - No complex settings. Just select and run for instant results


Perfect for designers, design teams, and anyone working with typography in Figma.


Feedback is welcome!

accepted.name: Lorenzo Brandimarte
accepted.description: Web and UI Designer | No-code developer

plugins.name: 批量字号行高对齐
plugins.description:
# 字号行高对齐工具


一款专为设计师打造的 Figma 插件，帮助您快速统一文本行高，提升设计规范性和效率。


## 🎯 核心功能


### 1. 智能行高设置

- **智能识别模式**：自动区分单行文本和段落文本，应用不同的行高倍数

- 单行文本（如标题、按钮）：默认 1.0 倍

- 段落文本（多行内容）：默认 1.8 倍

- **统一行高模式**：为所有文本应用相同的行高倍数

- **向上取偶数**：所有行高值自动向上取整为偶数，确保像素对齐


### 2. 批量查找替换

- **全局查找**：在选中的图层、画板或编组中查找所有文本

- **批量替换**：一键替换所有匹配的文本内容

- **实时预览**：输入时即时高亮显示匹配内容

- **智能定位**：点击文本列表可快速定位到对应图层


## 🎨 设计特色


- **卡片化界面**：现代简约的黑白设计风格

- **大圆角美学**：16px 圆角卡片，视觉更柔和

- **清晰的交互反馈**：橙色高亮主要操作，绿色提示成功状态

- **优化的布局**：720px 高度，提供更多内容展示空间


## 📝 使用方法


### 行高设置

1. 选择需要调整的文本图层、画板或编组

2. 选择模式（智能识别/统一行高）

3. 设置倍数值（支持 0.1-5.0）

4. 点击"应用到选中项"


### 查找替换

1. 切换到"查找替换"标签

2. 选择包含文本的图层

3. 输入查找内容（实时高亮显示）

4. 输入替换内容

5. 点击"全部替换"执行批量替换


## 🔄 更新日志


### v2.0.0 - 2025-07-02最新版

#### 新增功能

- ✨ 全新的查找替换功能

- ✨ 智能文本识别算法

- ✨ 实时文本高亮显示

- ✨ 快速定位文本图层


#### 界面优化

- 🎨 全新卡片化设计风格

- 🎨 大圆角视觉风格（16px主圆角）

- 🎨 黑白简约配色方案

- 🎨 优化的按钮和输入框样式

- 🎨 更柔和的 Toast 提示


#### 体验改进

- 📐 插件窗口高度增加到 720px

- ⏱️ Toast 提示显示时间延长至 4 秒

- 🔢 段落文本默认倍数调整为 1.8

- 🔢 行高计算改为向上取偶数

- 🔄 优化了刷新按钮位置


#### 技术优化

- 🚀 改进的文本节点查找算法

- 🚀 更准确的单行/段落文本判断

- 🚀 优化的字体加载处理

- 🚀 更好的错误处理机制


### v1.0.0 - 初始版本

- 基础行高设置功能

- 支持批量处理文本

- 简单的倍数设置


## 💡 使用提示


1. **智能识别准确性**：插件通过多种方式判断文本类型，包括换行符、自动调整属性、文本长度等

2. **混合字号处理**：包含多种字号的文本图层会被自动跳过

3. **字体加载**：插件会自动加载所需字体，部分特殊字体可能加载失败

4. **性能优化**：建议选择特定区域而非整个页面进行操作


## 🛠️ 技术支持


如遇到问题或有功能建议，欢迎反馈：

- 在 Figma 社区留言

- 提交 Issue 到项目仓库


---


Made with ❤️ for designers


---


# Font Size & Line Height Alignment Tool


A Figma plugin designed for designers to help you quickly unify text line heights and improve design consistency and efficiency.


## 🎯 Core Features


### 1. Smart Line Height Setting

- **Smart Detection Mode**: Automatically distinguishes between single-line text and paragraph text, applying different line height multipliers.

- Single-line text (e.g., titles, buttons): Default 1.0x

- Paragraph text (multi-line content): Default 1.8x

- **Uniform Line Height Mode**: Applies the same line height multiplier to all text.

- **Round Up to Nearest Even Number**: All line height values are automatically rounded up to the nearest even number to ensure pixel alignment.


### 2. Batch Find & Replace

- **Global Search**: Find all text within selected layers, frames, or groups.

- **Batch Replace**: Replace all matching text content with one click.

- **Live Preview**: Instantly highlights matching content as you type.

- **Smart Navigation**: Click on the text list to quickly navigate to the corresponding layer.


## 🎨 Design Features


- **Card-based Interface**: Modern, minimalist black and white design style.

- **Large Rounded Corners Aesthetic**: 16px rounded corner cards for a softer look.

- **Clear Interaction Feedback**: Orange highlights for primary actions, green for success states.

- **Optimized Layout**: 720px height to provide more content display space.


## 📝 How to Use


### Line Height Settings

1. Select the text layers, frames, or groups you want to adjust.

2. Choose a mode (Smart Detection / Uniform Line Height).

3. Set the multiplier value (supports 0.1-5.0).

4. Click "Apply to Selection".


### Find & Replace

1. Switch to the "Find & Replace" tab.

2. Select layers containing text.

3. Enter the search term (live highlighting).

4. Enter the replacement content.

5. Click "Replace All" to perform the batch replacement.


## 🔄 Changelog


### v2.0.0 - 2025-07-02 Latest Version

#### New Features

- ✨ All-new Find & Replace functionality.

- ✨ Smart text recognition algorithm.

- ✨ Real-time text highlighting.

- ✨ Quick navigation to text layers.


#### UI Optimization

- 🎨 New card-based design style.

- 🎨 Large rounded corner visual style (16px main radius).

- 🎨 Minimalist black and white color scheme.

- 🎨 Optimized button and input field styles.

- 🎨 Softer Toast notifications.


#### Experience Improvements

- 📐 Plugin window height increased to 720px.

- ⏱️ Toast notification display time extended to 4 seconds.

- 🔢 Default multiplier for paragraph text adjusted to 1.8.

- 🔢 Line height calculation changed to round up to the nearest even number.

- 🔄 Optimized the position of the refresh button.


#### Technical Optimizations

- 🚀 Improved text node finding algorithm.

- 🚀 More accurate single-line/paragraph text detection.

- 🚀 Optimized font loading handling.

- 🚀 Better error handling mechanism.


### v1.0.0 - Initial Release

- Basic line height setting feature.

- Support for batch processing text.

- Simple multiplier settings.


## 💡 Usage Tips


1. **Smart Detection Accuracy**: The plugin determines text type using various methods, including line breaks, auto-resize properties, and text length.

2. **Mixed Font Sizes**: Text layers containing multiple font sizes will be automatically skipped.

3. **Font Loading**: The plugin will automatically load required fonts, though some special fonts may fail to load.

4. **Performance Optimization**: It is recommended to select specific areas rather than the entire page for operations.


## 🛠️ Technical Support


If you encounter any issues or have feature suggestions, feel free to provide feedback:

- Leave a message in the Figma Community.

- Submit an Issue to the project repository.

140531.name: 批量字号行高对齐
140531.description:
# 字号行高对齐工具


一款专为设计师打造的 Figma 插件，帮助您快速统一文本行高，提升设计规范性和效率。


## 🎯 核心功能


### 1. 智能行高设置

- **智能识别模式**：自动区分单行文本和段落文本，应用不同的行高倍数

- 单行文本（如标题、按钮）：默认 1.0 倍

- 段落文本（多行内容）：默认 1.8 倍

- **统一行高模式**：为所有文本应用相同的行高倍数

- **向上取偶数**：所有行高值自动向上取整为偶数，确保像素对齐


### 2. 批量查找替换

- **全局查找**：在选中的图层、画板或编组中查找所有文本

- **批量替换**：一键替换所有匹配的文本内容

- **实时预览**：输入时即时高亮显示匹配内容

- **智能定位**：点击文本列表可快速定位到对应图层


## 🎨 设计特色


- **卡片化界面**：现代简约的黑白设计风格

- **大圆角美学**：16px 圆角卡片，视觉更柔和

- **清晰的交互反馈**：橙色高亮主要操作，绿色提示成功状态

- **优化的布局**：720px 高度，提供更多内容展示空间


## 📝 使用方法


### 行高设置

1. 选择需要调整的文本图层、画板或编组

2. 选择模式（智能识别/统一行高）

3. 设置倍数值（支持 0.1-5.0）

4. 点击"应用到选中项"


### 查找替换

1. 切换到"查找替换"标签

2. 选择包含文本的图层

3. 输入查找内容（实时高亮显示）

4. 输入替换内容

5. 点击"全部替换"执行批量替换


## 🔄 更新日志


### v2.0.0 - 2025-07-02最新版

#### 新增功能

- ✨ 全新的查找替换功能

- ✨ 智能文本识别算法

- ✨ 实时文本高亮显示

- ✨ 快速定位文本图层


#### 界面优化

- 🎨 全新卡片化设计风格

- 🎨 大圆角视觉风格（16px主圆角）

- 🎨 黑白简约配色方案

- 🎨 优化的按钮和输入框样式

- 🎨 更柔和的 Toast 提示


#### 体验改进

- 📐 插件窗口高度增加到 720px

- ⏱️ Toast 提示显示时间延长至 4 秒

- 🔢 段落文本默认倍数调整为 1.8

- 🔢 行高计算改为向上取偶数

- 🔄 优化了刷新按钮位置


#### 技术优化

- 🚀 改进的文本节点查找算法

- 🚀 更准确的单行/段落文本判断

- 🚀 优化的字体加载处理

- 🚀 更好的错误处理机制


### v1.0.0 - 初始版本

- 基础行高设置功能

- 支持批量处理文本

- 简单的倍数设置


## 💡 使用提示


1. **智能识别准确性**：插件通过多种方式判断文本类型，包括换行符、自动调整属性、文本长度等

2. **混合字号处理**：包含多种字号的文本图层会被自动跳过

3. **字体加载**：插件会自动加载所需字体，部分特殊字体可能加载失败

4. **性能优化**：建议选择特定区域而非整个页面进行操作


## 🛠️ 技术支持


如遇到问题或有功能建议，欢迎反馈：

- 在 Figma 社区留言

- 提交 Issue 到项目仓库

# Font Size & Line Height Alignment Tool


A Figma plugin designed for designers to help you quickly unify text line heights and improve design consistency and efficiency.


## 🎯 Core Features


### 1. Smart Line Height Setting

- **Smart Detection Mode**: Automatically distinguishes between single-line text and paragraph text, applying different line height multipliers.

- Single-line text (e.g., titles, buttons): Default 1.0x

- Paragraph text (multi-line content): Default 1.8x

- **Uniform Line Height Mode**: Applies the same line height multiplier to all text.

- **Round Up to Nearest Even Number**: All line height values are automatically rounded up to the nearest even number to ensure pixel alignment.


### 2. Batch Find & Replace

- **Global Search**: Find all text within selected layers, frames, or groups.

- **Batch Replace**: Replace all matching text content with one click.

- **Live Preview**: Instantly highlights matching content as you type.

- **Smart Navigation**: Click on the text list to quickly navigate to the corresponding layer.


## 🎨 Design Features


- **Card-based Interface**: Modern, minimalist black and white design style.

- **Large Rounded Corners Aesthetic**: 16px rounded corner cards for a softer look.

- **Clear Interaction Feedback**: Orange highlights for primary actions, green for success states.

- **Optimized Layout**: 720px height to provide more content display space.


## 📝 How to Use


### Line Height Settings

1. Select the text layers, frames, or groups you want to adjust.

2. Choose a mode (Smart Detection / Uniform Line Height).

3. Set the multiplier value (supports 0.1-5.0).

4. Click "Apply to Selection".


### Find & Replace

1. Switch to the "Find & Replace" tab.

2. Select layers containing text.

3. Enter the search term (live highlighting).

4. Enter the replacement content.

5. Click "Replace All" to perform the batch replacement.


## 🔄 Changelog


### v2.0.0 - 2025-07-02 Latest Version

#### New Features

- ✨ All-new Find & Replace functionality.

- ✨ Smart text recognition algorithm.

- ✨ Real-time text highlighting.

- ✨ Quick navigation to text layers.


#### UI Optimization

- 🎨 New card-based design style.

- 🎨 Large rounded corner visual style (16px main radius).

- 🎨 Minimalist black and white color scheme.

- 🎨 Optimized button and input field styles.

- 🎨 Softer Toast notifications.


#### Experience Improvements

- 📐 Plugin window height increased to 720px.

- ⏱️ Toast notification display time extended to 4 seconds.

- 🔢 Default multiplier for paragraph text adjusted to 1.8.

- 🔢 Line height calculation changed to round up to the nearest even number.

- 🔄 Optimized the position of the refresh button.


#### Technical Optimizations

- 🚀 Improved text node finding algorithm.

- 🚀 More accurate single-line/paragraph text detection.

- 🚀 Optimized font loading handling.

- 🚀 Better error handling mechanism.


### v1.0.0 - Initial Release

- Basic line height setting feature.

- Support for batch processing text.

- Simple multiplier settings.


## 💡 Usage Tips


1. **Smart Detection Accuracy**: The plugin determines text type using various methods, including line breaks, auto-resize properties, and text length.

2. **Mixed Font Sizes**: Text layers containing multiple font sizes will be automatically skipped.

3. **Font Loading**: The plugin will automatically load required fonts, though some special fonts may fail to load.

4. **Performance Optimization**: It is recommended to select specific areas rather than the entire page for operations.


## 🛠️ Technical Support


If you encounter any issues or have feature suggestions, feel free to provide feedback:

- Leave a message in the Figma Community.

- Submit an Issue to the project repository.

plugins.name: Auto Layout Checker
plugins.description:
Auto Layout Checker helps you maintain design consistency by identifying and converting elements that don't use Auto Layout. Perfect for cleaning up designs and ensuring layout consistency across your files.


🔍 Key Features:

• Scan entire pages or selected elements for missing Auto Layout

• One-click conversion of frames and groups to Auto Layout

• Clear visual feedback for converted elements

• Theme-aware interface that matches your Figma theme

• Quick navigation to elements through direct selection


🎯 Perfect for:

• Design system cleanup and maintenance

• Legacy file modernization

• Team collaboration and consistency checks

• Quick Auto Layout implementation


💡 How to use:

1. Select elements to scan (or leave unselected to scan entire page)

2. Click "Scan" to find elements without Auto Layout

3. Click any element to navigate to it in your design

4. Use the "Convert" button to instantly apply Auto Layout


The plugin automatically applies sensible Auto Layout defaults:

• Vertical layout orientation

• 10px spacing between elements

• 10px padding on all sides

• Automatic sizing for both axes


Keep your designs maintainable and responsive with Auto Layout Checker!
plugins.tagline: Quickly find and convert elements missing Auto Layout, streamlining your design system consistency.

plugins.name: Detach Aliases
plugins.description:
Detach Aliases lets you resolve variable's aliased values from their sources. Easily detach a specific group of variables or all variables in a collection. You can target one mode at a time or all modes at once!


  1. Select your collection
  2. Select the target mode or all modes
  3. Enter the path to a group of variables or a single variable (see below for bulk actions)
  4. Detach


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Bulk Actions

You will most likely want to run this on a group or the entire collection:

  1. Update all variables within a group by entering the path/to/group
  2. Update all variables in the collection by entering / @all or @root in the path input
  3. You will see all variables which are located in the path and would have aliases detached in the preview panel on the left


Plugin Notes

  1. Variable names and paths are case sensitive
  2. Detaching variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Break your collection aliases en masse!

plugins.name: SPLOC - Selected the parent of component layer
plugins.description:
A plugin for Figma that automatically selects the parent component when any child within the component or its instance is selected.


Main features:

  1. Automatic detection and selection of the parent component
  2. Automatic collapse of the selected component
  3. On/Off switch to enable/disable functionality
  4. Memories the last selection to prevent cyclic selections


How to use:

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Launch the plugin (it is active by default)
  3. Select any element within the component or its instance
  4. The plugin will automatically:
  5. Finds the parent component
  6. Select it
  7. Flattens the structure of the component


Interface:

  1. Compact window with ON/OFF switch
  2. The switch allows you to temporarily disable plugin functionality


Technical features:

  1. Works with components (COMPONENT) and their instances (INSTANCE)
  2. Prevents cyclic selections
  3. Optimized for working with large files
  4. Minimal impact on Figma performance


Application:

Ideal for working with large component systems where switching between children and parent components is often required.


----------------------------------------



Плагин для Figma, который автоматически выделяет родительский компонент при выборе любого дочернего элемента внутри компонента или его экземпляра.


Основные возможности:

  1. Автоматическое определение и выбор родительского компонента
  2. Автоматическое схлопывание (collapse) выбранного компонента
  3. Переключатель On/Off для включения/отключения функционала
  4. Запоминание последнего выбора для предотвращения циклических выделений


Как использовать:

  1. Установите плагин
  2. Запустите плагин (он активен по умолчанию)
  3. Выберите любой элемент внутри компонента или его экземпляра
  4. Плагин автоматически:
  5. Найдет родительский компонент
  6. Выделит его
  7. Схлопнет структуру компонента


Интерфейс:

  1. Компактное окно с переключателем ON/OFF
  2. Переключатель позволяет временно отключить функционал плагина


Технические особенности:

  1. Работает с компонентами (COMPONENT) и их экземплярами (INSTANCE)
  2. Предотвращает циклические выделения
  3. Оптимизирован для работы с большими файлами
  4. Минимальное влияние на производительность Figma


Применение:

Идеально подходит для работы с большими компонентными системами, где часто требуется переключение между дочерними элементами и родительскими компонентами.

  4. Минимальное влияние на производительность Figma


Применение:

Идеально подходит для работы с большими компонентными системами, где часто требуется переключение между дочерними элементами и родительскими компонентами.

manifest.name: SPLOCK - Selected the parent of component layer

119658.tagline: Automatically selects parent component when child layer is selected
